revised_title: Investigating the Role of Testicular Secretion in the Formation of Secondary Sexual Characters
tldr: The authors investigate the role of testicular secretion in the formation of secondary sexual characters, specifically focusing on sheep and chickens. They find that the absence of testicular secretion due to vas deferens ligation leads to a lack of male secondary sexual characteristics, suggesting that an internal secretion by the testicle plays a crucial role in their development.
